SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT opencps_processorder.processOrderId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_processorder.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId AND opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = ? INNER JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processorder.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId AND opencps_processstep.processStepId = ? INNER JOIN ( SELECT opencps_stepallowance.processStepId, opencps_stepallowance.readOnly, role.userId FROM opencps_stepallowance INNER JOIN ( SELECT role_.roleId, users_roles.userId FROM role_ INNER JOIN users_roles ON role_.roleId = users_roles.roleId WHERE users_roles.userId = ? ) AS role ON opencps_stepallowance.roleId = role.roleId ) AS stepallowance ON stepallowance.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId WHERE ( opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = 0
OR ( opencps_processorder.assignToUserId != 0 AND stepallowance.userId != opencps_processorder.assignToUserId AND stepallowance.readOnly = TRUE ) ) OR opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT DISTINCT opencps_processorder.*, opencps_dossier.serviceConfigId, opencps_dossier.subjectId, opencps_dossier.subjectName, opencps_dossier.receptionNo, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName, opencps_processstep.stepName, opencps_processstep.sequenceNo, opencps_processstep.daysDuration, opencps_processstep.referenceDossierPartId, stepallowance.readOnly FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_processorder.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId AND opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = ? INNER JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processorder.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId AND opencps_processstep.processStepId = ? INNER JOIN ( SELECT opencps_stepallowance.processStepId, opencps_stepallowance.readOnly, role.userId FROM opencps_stepallowance INNER JOIN ( SELECT role_.roleId, users_roles.userId FROM role_ INNER JOIN users_roles ON role_.roleId = users_roles.roleId WHERE users_roles.userId = ? ) AS role ON opencps_stepallowance.roleId = role.roleId ) AS stepallowance ON stepallowance.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId WHERE ( opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = 0
OR ( opencps_processorder.assignToUserId != 0 AND stepallowance.userId != opencps_processorder.assignToUserId AND stepallowance.readOnly = TRUE ) )
OR opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ? ORDER BY opencps_processorder.modifiedDate DESC, opencps_processorder.actionDatetime DESC
